title: 加一 (Plus One)
content: 思路: // @Title: 加一 (Plus One) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2021-08-16 19:51:43 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 36.9 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int[] plusOne(int[] digits) { int current=1; for (int i = digits.length-1; i >= 0; i--) { int digit = digits[i]; digits[i]=(digit+current)%10; current=(digit+current)/10; } if (current==1){ int[] result=new int[digits.length+1]; result[0]=1; for (int i = 1; i < result.length; i++) { result[i]=digits[i-1]; } return result; } return digits; } }
